title: Ninja Gaiden II demo [360]
description:
"With the gracious help of drkhades, I believe I have a good file copy for you to download the NG2 DEMO. Here is some quick info you will need.

It is a .7z file extension and you will need that program to open it. No password should be required. You can download 7z unpacker HERE -- http://www.7-zip.org/

The NG2 DEMO download is on our site. Click on the link below to download the file to your hard drive:

Once you download the file you will need to burn the "Content" folder on to a CD and then place the disk in your XBOX to upload the file to your unit. . When you unzip the download, burn the CONTENT folder right on the disc, then pop it in the 360, then go to games library and recently downloaded."

Credits go to drkhades and whoever else help upload this file and give it to us.
